title: Sketchbook Folio, "Calm Sea with Sailboat", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Calm sea coming onto shore at left in foreground. At right in distance, one small sailboat.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Calm Sea with Sailboat", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-8.
